title: Website image editing tutorial: WordPress, Paint.NET and PowerPoint(!)
description: Don't know anything about editing images, but still need to produce web articles, blog posts and other online content with photos? Here's a tutorial for the absolute beginner on how to perform basic image editing with Paint.NET and upload images to WordPress. Also some tips on how you combine text and image content with PowerPoint, then export the results onto your website. Who needs Photoshop anyway?
